title: What the hell's wrong with this community
body:
People literally cannot fathom the possibility of NOT being an asshole
They just don't think
I just LOVE coming out of every game stressed and angry because people forget its a video game and decide to take out their rage and aggression on you. 
Is there anything I can do besides report and move on?

replies.body:
> Is there anything I can do besides report and move on?

Yeah there is but it is really hard to do if your already upset.

------

If your looking for revenge then no one can help.  If your really want to understand how to get some peace from this game, then some people can help you. 

If your looking for a friendly game, there is a section that can help, Above all don't take insults to mean anything to you.  When people outright try to make you mad they do so for selfish and petty reasons. 

Their are some people who still care and are not rude, Believe it or not you can easily find friends who are not rude! 

  GLHF friend.

I wish I had you in some of my games!

:)

> I wish I had you in some of my games!

Thanks and maybe we can do that!  I haven't played in awhile, I will turn the game back on soon. Just My Mom has been sick and I have had to devote a lot of time and energy to that. I'm not making an excuse but I'm going to try. In the meantime checkout other boards that can help you. GL friend!
